mapper.update:
update rc_prod_sku_prop_info
PROD_ID = #{prodId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROD_SKU_PROP_ID = #{prodPropId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROD_SKU_ID = #{prodSkuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_SKU_PROP_NAME = #{prodPropName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_SKU_PROP_VAL = #{prodPropVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROD_SKU_PROP_ENUM_ID = #{prodPropEnumId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HAS_IMG = #{hasImg,jdbcType=BIT},
IS_PACK_SERVICE = #{isPackService,jdbcType=BIT},
where PROD_SKU_PROP_INFO_ID = #{prodSkuPropInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select PROD_SKU_PROP_INFO_ID, PROD_ID, PROD_SKU_PROP_ID, PROD_SKU_ID, PROD_SKU_PROP_NAME, PROD_SKU_PROP_VAL, PROD_SKU_PROP_ENUM_ID, HAS_IMG, IS_PACK_SERVICE from rc_prod_sku_prop_info where PROD_SKU_PROP_INFO_ID = #{prodSkuPropInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
